news.title: Google Photos sees several app improvements
news.summary: The Google Photos app has been updated to make it easier to navigate your gallery and view image information. Google says the photo view has been redesigned to provide a “simpler, more modern, and more intuitive UI’

news.title: Paramount agrees to pay Trump $16 million, clearing way for multibillion-dollar merger
news.summary: Paramount has agreed to pay $16 million to resolve President Donald Trump's lawsuit against its subsidiary CBS. The settlement payment is inclusive of Trump’s legal fees and costs, Paramount said.
